summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Pembimbing PWA feature. All backend APIs (16/16 tests) and frontend UI components working correctly. Features tested: Pembimbing PWA login with kode_akses, dashboard with today's attendance, filter by waktu sholat, history tab with date picker, Admin pembimbing management with kode_akses display and regenerate functionality.
critical_code_review_comments: Pembimbing PWA uses kode_akses (9-digit access code) instead of password - this is by design for easier sharing with pembimbing
kode_akses is auto-generated when creating pembimbing and can be regenerated by admin
kode_akses is NOT exposed in pembimbing PWA /me endpoint for security (only admin can see it)
All data-testid attributes are properly implemented for testing
seed_data_creation: None - used existing test data. Pembimbing 'Wafa' manages asrama 'Kamar A1' with 1 santri (rijal umami)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Pembimbing PWA feature is fully implemented and tested. The kode_akses for pembimbing 'Wafa' is '258064095' (may change if regenerated). All endpoints work correctly: /api/pembimbing/login, /api/pembimbing/me, /api/pembimbing/santri-absensi-hari-ini, /api/pembimbing/absensi-riwayat, /api/pembimbing/statistik, and admin CRUD endpoints including /api/pembimbing/{id}/regenerate-kode-akses.

pembimbing_pwa_login.details: POST /api/pembimbing/login works with username and kode_akses, returns JWT token

pembimbing_pwa_me.details: GET /api/pembimbing/me returns pembimbing info without exposing kode_akses

pembimbing_pwa_today_attendance.details: GET /api/pembimbing/santri-absensi-hari-ini returns today's attendance with optional waktu_sholat filter

pembimbing_pwa_history.details: GET /api/pembimbing/absensi-riwayat returns historical attendance for specified date

pembimbing_pwa_statistik.details: GET /api/pembimbing/statistik returns attendance statistics with breakdown by waktu sholat

frontend_pembimbing_login_page.details: Login page at /pembimbing-app/login displays correctly with username and kode_akses inputs

frontend_pembimbing_dashboard.details: Dashboard shows statistics table, filter buttons, santri list grouped by asrama

frontend_pembimbing_history_tab.details: History tab shows date picker with month/day selection and historical attendance

frontend_admin_pembimbing_page.details: Admin page at /pembimbing shows kode_akses column with copy and regenerate buttons

mocked_apis.note: All APIs are fully implemented and functional
